product_description: Its more fun when its Wacky! Kinetic Sand is the squeezable sand where you can FEEL the fun! Youve seen it before, but youve never felt anything like it! Pack it, pull it, shape it and love it, Kinetic Sand is so incredible you cant put it down. Its kinetic ? meaning it sticks to itself and not to you! It oozes, moves and melts right before your eyes. It flows through your fingers like a slow-moving liquid, but leaves them completely dry. Kinetic Sand stimulates childrens creative skills allowing them to create anything they can imagine over and over again. Kinetic Sand never dries out and is gluten free. This soft and stretchy sand easily cleans up while delivering non-stop fun! Its squeezable sand you cant put down. Feel the difference with Kinetic Sand!
